title: Airwheel M3 Electric Skateboard for Teenagers Really Gives Me a Cool Weekend Trip
text: Airwheel M3 Electric Skateboard for Teenagers Really Gives Me a Cool Weekend Trip I am a crazy skateboarder and Airwheel M3 successfully becomes a blessing to me. Here, I am willing to share my very first happy trip with my beloved Airwheel M3. United States, 21 October 2015 -- A small trip on weekend is my favorite hobby. Therefore, I am always seeking a kind of free and easy way of travelling, yet without suffering from inadequate travel transport, but now Airwheel has published M3 electric skateboard . AsI am a crazy skateboarder and Airwheel M3 successfully becomes blessing to me. Here, I am willing to share my very first happy trip with my beloved Airwheel M3.Airwheel M3 motorized scooter is powered by imported high-quality SONY lithium-ion battery, which really makes my riding relaxing. The equipped 2.4G wireless remote control lets me lock and unlock M3 without any effort. Whatâ€™s more, Airwheel M3 is so magical as if it could understand what I want to do. For example, I slightly lean forward, it starts moving forward. When I turn left a little bit, it also turns left. According to the specifications, I get to know Airwheel M3 is based on aerospace attitude control theory, fuzzy software algorithm and gyroscope system to realize self-balancing, that is why riding is so easy and unbound. The whole trip is very stable and comfortable, which mainly benefits from installed four wide wheels and high-elasticity shock-absorbing block When I rode Airwheel M3 wireless remote control skateboard in scenic spot, many people were attracted by my cool skateboard and stopped me to ask some details about M3. Indeed, the figure of Airwheel M3 is very cool. All skateboard lovers must be attracted by its high-end outline and exquisitedesign. M3 has two battery capacities: 81.4Wh and 163Wh. I choose the latter. According to my first trip, the fully-charged M3 is able to support 54kmIn general, such a range can cover all small trips on weekends. All in all, if you are also a skateboard enthusiast, Airwheel M3 electric skateboard must be your best choice. # # #
